formattedAddress: 80 Central Park W Suite C, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 80 Central Park W Suite C, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Richards is a compassionate HEALER. My family jokes that she is a "detective" in the field of medicine, uncovering problems that dozens of doctors before her missed. Her approach is scientific and logical: find the root cause of a problem through testing, examination and "interviewing" the patient, fix (or minimize) whatever is triggering the disorder, and then symptoms resolve. Her analogies make complex medical terms easy to understand. I promise you, no matter who you are, Dr. Richards can ENHANCE your health.

text.text: Dr. Richards is a compassionate HEALER. My family jokes that she is a "detective" in the field of medicine, uncovering problems that dozens of doctors before her missed. Her analogies make complex medical terms easy to understand. I promise you, no matter who you are, Dr. Richards can ENHANCE your health.

originalText.text: A dear friend recommended me to visit Dr. Richards because of my constant headache, ear ringing, high blood pressure,  and stress. Since I started visiting her, my health has improved many-fold, my headache is gone and my blood pressure is good now.  I cannot be sufficiently grateful to Dr. Richards for sll she has done for me. She cares about her patients and I feel she makes the extra effort of getting to know all the physical and emotional health of her patients.  I visit Dr. Richards once a month for an acupuncture session. Her magical touch makes me feel amazingly relaxed. Highly recommended!

originalText.text: Dr Richards has more knowledge than any MD I have ever been to.  She has resources and is able to do what other MD's dont even know about. She also was totally there for me, immediately checking in with the radiologist, daily with me after I broke 3 ribs at the height of covid.  She handled everything without sending me to the hospital with all the covid patients and e/r's in chaos.

originalText.text:
I have been suffering from migraine for many years. All doctors I went to gave me strong medicines that made me feel bad. Instead I was taking tons of Advil which helped somewhat.
I came to Dr. Richards as a holistic doctor for a different health issue. Dr. Richards evaluated me and uncovered other problems. So she treated me with acupuncture. And to my great surprise, my migraine was gone for one year already! It came back recently, but with much less pain. I am going back to Dr. Richards for my fix! So happy I found her!

text.text:

I came to Dr. Richards as a holistic doctor for a different health issue. Dr. Richards evaluated me and uncovered other problems. So she treated me with acupuncture. And to my great surprise, my migraine was gone for one year already! It came back recently, but with much less pain. I am going back to Dr. Richards for my fix! So happy I found her!

originalText.text:
I was referred to Dr.Marina Richards by a co worker and I have to say, coming to see her was one of the best choices I have ever made in regards to my physical well-being in a long time.   I was suffering from chronic knee pain, arthritic symptoms and I had just started peri-menopause (hot flashes, mood swings, in short -- 'bouts of erratic crazy symptoms).   Upon meeting Dr. Richards, she was kind and very sympathetic to my issues.  And with this being my first time seeing an acupuncturist she made me feel very comfortable.  She assured me, I would be fine so I totally placed my ailments in her hands and stripped down for the needles...

I was having them maybe 5 - 6 times during the day and nights were unbearable. After the one visit, I was down to maybe 1 or 2 and after the second or 3rd visit the hot flashes are very rare.  The knee pain is gone and now the only swings I have are in the park.  I was feeling so good, I actually took a couple of months off from acupuncture and my original symptoms were still very minimal.

After a two month hiatus, I just recently returned I was diagnosed me with vertigo. And the antibiotics alone were not working.  One visit with Dr. Marina-- symptoms have all but disappeared.  I will now let her treat me for allergies and sinus issues and hopefully they too will be a thing of the past for me.

If you have ever contemplated trying acupuncture as an non-evasive alternative to meds, I would highly recommend Dr. Richards.   Her methods are extraordinary and her personality and professionalism are a plus.
